venue.name: William J Connel Memorial Rink and Pool

item.description:
Please join us for a new winter event. Indoor adult lap swimming.

After reviewing the comments listed in the original idea and with my own personal schedule, Thursday night is the winner at 7pm!

Connell Memorial Swimming Pool (Mass Dept of Conservation and Recreation- DCR, formerly MDC)
220 Broad Street
Weymouth, MA 02188
781 335 2090

Admission is FREE at all DCR managed pools.

Thursday, November 4th
7pm. Pool is open until 9pm (I will not be swimming for 2 hours, but feel free to stay if you can!)
We can meet in the pool area.

This is not a venue I have tried before therefore I am not aware of the locker room conditions. Per comments listed in the idea section, they do have showers but no outlets (for hair dryers). I am not aware of the locker situation. Feel free to post additional information if you have it to help. THANKS!


Pool schedule (per DCR website):
Open from October 9th through the end of May.
Hours:
Monday â€“ Thursday
7am to 3pm Open Swim
6pm to 9pm Adult Swim

Friday
7am to 3pm Open Swim
6pm to 9pm Family Swim

Saturday and Sunday
10am to 5pm Open Swim
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the pool area.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group
